message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $140. I think you'll find it's a great deal!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I can't go as low as $120.  How about we meet in the middle at $130?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $125. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
